label: 抽分銭
本: The Experiences of Japanese Monks Sent as Envoys to Ming China. ACTA ASIATICA, 103 . The Tōhō Gakkai . 2012-08
説明文: After the ship's return to Japan, a levy (chubunsen), corresponding to ten percent of the price of the goods that they were bringing into Japan, was collected from the merchants.
